casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rodney TAYLOR. No. 505A99-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of September 2007 by Defendant to Dismiss Post-Conviction Counsel(s) and Have New Post-Conviction Counsel(s) Appointed:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
